sermons.title: Satisfied To Do Little When We Should Be Doing Much
sermons.description: Elisha is on his deathbed when he receives a visit from King Joash, who seeks Elisha's counsel concerning the dilemma he is in. Elisha gives Joash a test which he fails because he was satisfied to do little when he should have done much. 1-The good cause 2-The sufficient resources 3-The missing element
